page.title: 05WILDLIFE:OGWELL AND DENBURY
page.content:
The farmers in our area told us they see these animals often on their farmland:- rabbits,badgers,foxes, hedgehogs,hares,rats,mice and bats. These animals were seen less often:- stoats,weasels,pheasants and grey squirrels. The farmers also told us that they saw these special plants and animals:- mink,deer,dragonflies,wild flowers, wild duck,and some small evergreen oak. One farmer had milk thistles on his land and a magnificent walnut tree. We were suprised but happy to see that ten farmers out of sixteen had seen barn owls regulary.
{Darren Salmons & Shaun Marshall { aged 10
